name: Squid City Blues
description:
Squid City Blues

It's your last day on the job. A shitty day on a shitty job. But a Squid has been killed, and someone's got to clean up the mess. So go over there and get this murder solved.

At least, that's the plan. But I didn't get this one finished before the jam deadline. I've got a pretty nice homemade raycasting engine with a procedurally generated city and procedurally generated citizens, but no actual plot - yet. I'll try and get it added before the rating gets going.

If you suffer bad performance (I didn't get around to optimizing the engine), try the stand alone .exe version. That one should work for most modern windows systems. No Linux or Mac versions yet.
